医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示福克斯内皮性角膜营养不良背后的机制伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究揭示了对福克斯内皮性角膜营养不良 (FECD) 背后机制的重要见解，FECD 是与年龄相关的视力丧失的常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-uncovers-mechanisms-behind-Fuchs-Endothelial-Corneal-Dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-uncovers-mechanisms-behind-Fuchs-Endothelial-Corneal-Dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b804aca-5f80-4143-93a4-d3d1a5b01be8 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 21:13:23 -0400 Study uncovers mechanisms behind Fuchs Endothelial Corneal Dystrophy
多吃水果和蔬菜以降低虚弱风险研究发现，摄入更多的水果和蔬菜可以显着降低虚弱风险，特别是对于体重不足的人。整个水果和红橙色蔬菜提供最大的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Eat-more-fruit-and-vegetables-to-lower-frailty-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Eat-more-fruit-and-vegetables-to-lower-frailty-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3984da19-1101-49d1-979a-89adbc566783 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:55:00 -0400 Eat more fruit and vegetables to lower frailty risk
研究揭示MYC基因在前列腺癌发生和进展中的作用通过跟踪前列腺癌细胞随时间的变化，约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心的研究人员发现，MYC 基因的激活：众所周知的致癌基因——；引发一系列事件，导致疾病的发生和进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-MYC-genes-role-in-prostate-cancer-initiation-and-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-MYC-genes-role-in-prostate-cancer-initiation-and-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21fbb022-5cdc-4678-b318-389123ca6b4d Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:53:00 -0400 Study reveals MYC gene's role in prostate cancer initiation and progression
研究揭示了预测多发性硬化症残疾恶化的生物标志物今天在 ECTRIMS 2024 上发表的一项开创性研究确定了可以预测多发性硬化症 (MS) 残疾恶化的关键生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-biomarkers-that-predict-disability-worsening-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-biomarkers-that-predict-disability-worsening-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58594c6e-1a75-4859-93de-a519aea7f581 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:50:48 -0400 Study reveals biomarkers that predict disability worsening in multiple sclerosis
慈善投资成立研究中心推进疾病精准诊断一项 2100 万澳元的未偿慈善投资将建立一个开创性的研究中心，以推进对影响数百万澳大利亚人的疾病的精确诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Philanthropic-investment-builtes-research-center-to-advance- precision-diagnosis-for-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Philanthropic-investment-builtes-research-center-to-advance- precision-diagnosis-for-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a50a66e-015b-48c9-a9cf-c7d26c4cd0da Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:47:00 -0400 Philanthropic investment establishes research center to advance precision diagnosis for diseases
研究表明，巴西素食主义者满足蛋白质需求，但依赖超加工产品在 JAMA Network Open 上发表的一篇文章中，圣保罗大学医学院 (FM-USP) 的研究人员报告了一项涉及巴西 774 名遵循纯素饮食的男性和女性的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Brazilian-vegans-meet- Protein-needs-but-rely-on-ultra-processed-products-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Brazilian-vegans-meet- Protein-needs-but-rely-on-ultra-processed-products-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=245dd2fc-8fc7-4057-9e37-b208af6d984c Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:41:29 -0400 Brazilian vegans meet protein needs but rely on ultra-processed products, study shows
研究人员鉴定出细菌菌株来对抗抗生素耐药性肠道感染抗生素耐药细菌感染经常发生在患有慢性炎症性肠道疾病（例如炎症性肠病）的患者以及长期服用抗生素的患者中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Researchers-identify-bacterial-strains-to-combat-antibiotic-pressive-gut-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Researchers-identify-bacterial-strains-to-combat-antibiotic-pressive-gut-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07d3c423-40bc-45a8-84fe-77eb8699c7b0 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:35:20 -0400 Researchers identify bacterial strains to combat antibiotic-resistant gut infections
FORT-2 试验显示膀胱癌免疫治疗组合有希望的结果国际 FORT-2 临床试验的结果表明，包括免疫疗法在内的联合治疗对于局部晚期或转移性膀胱癌患者是安全且可耐受的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/FORT-2-trial-shows-promising-results-for-bladder-cancer-immunotherapy-combination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/FORT-2-trial-shows-promising-results-for-bladder-cancer-immunotherapy-combination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00d9e784-cd1d-4626-bea4-169c7005521e Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:30:03 -0400 FORT-2 trial shows promising results for bladder cancer immunotherapy combination
牙釉质中的免疫蛋白提供了有关古代人类健康的线索一种观察牙釉质的新方法可以为科学家提供一条更深入了解从古代到现代人类健康的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Immune- Proteins-in-tooth-enamel-provide-clues-about-ancient- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Immune- Proteins-in-tooth-enamel-provide-clues-about-ancient- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=770d08ce-1201-440f-bbca-a4c6ab420b26 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:26:20 -0400 Immune proteins in tooth enamel provide clues about ancient human health
合作研究为梅毒疫苗开发带来希望世界各地的梅毒病例激增，公共卫生官员正在寻找阻止传播的方法。现在，一项针对四大洲梅毒遗传学的大型合作研究发现了疫苗可能目标的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Collaborative-study-offers-hope-for-syphilis-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Collaborative-study-offers-hope-for-syphilis-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27771ed4-e0bb-49c3-8bb0-8f41600be8e8 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:20:09 -0400 Collaborative study offers hope for syphilis vaccine development
